attributes.action: Move the UK to an 8 day week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The move from the current 7 day week to an 8 day week consisting of a 3 day weekend would require the extension of the working day from 7.5 to 8.5 hours.  The benefits of increased productivity due to less stress and generally improved lifestyle would enhance the economy of an already overworked nation...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
